goal.ch: 控制系統理論基礎之學習，讓修課學生了解什麼是控制系統，使其後續能對系統做基本的控制設計與效能分析。修習本課程後學生會了解如何描述線性系統的動態方程，判斷系統的穩定性，同時了解時域、S域、頻域，極點與頻率響應分析等技術。
goal.en: The course aims to enable students to understand the basic principles of control systems. In particular, after taking this course, students should be able to analyze linear systems' stability, performance, and robustness.

outline.ch:
1. Introduce to Control Systems
2. Modeling of Dynamic Systems
3.Solution of Differential Equations of Dynamic Systems
4.Block Diagrams and Signal-Flow Graphs
5.Stability of Linear Control Systems
6.Important Components of Feedback Control Systems
7.Time-Domain Performance of Control Systems
8.State-Space Analysis and Control Design
9.Root-Locus Analysis
